content: this **advanced beginner** ear warmer is the perfect thing for all your fall and winter craft fairs or for holiday gifting it uses only basic stitches to make this fun textured fabric that works up super quickly also if using the called-for wool of the andes yarn in two colors you should have enough leftover yarn to make a second ear warmer by reversing the colors this pdf has everything you might need to make this pattern including tutorials and linked videos tutorials for the foundation single_crochet fsc and the yarn over slip_stitch yoslst supplemental pictures and a stitch chart there s even a video that is linked throughout to show you how to make this pattern from start to finish not a beginner the pdf also has a consolidated version of the pattern for you more experienced crocheters **included in the pdf us terms english only ** * cover page with a large full-color photo of the finished item * required materials pattern notes etc page * foundation single_crochet tutorial full-color photo tutorial with link to video tutorial * yarn over slip_stitch tutorial full-color photo tutorial with link to video tutorial * detailed pattern with supplemental instructional photos notes and tips and tricks * link to a full video pattern for this pattern * consolidated pattern for more experienced crocheters * completion page with another large full-color photo of the finished item * stitch chart - not available in the free online version **other details ** finished size available in 6 sizes toddler 1-3 yrs small child 3-5 yrs child 6-10 yrs teen/adult small adult medium adult large **let s keep in touch ** want to be the first to know when a new pattern drops join my email list get details and sign up here 1 want to hang out me too find me on instagram 2 facebook 3 + youtube 4 thanks for supporting my business i hope you enjoy the pattern and feel free to message me if you have any questions 1 https //www hooksbookswanderlust com/free-printable/ 2 https //www instagram com/hooksbookswanderlust/ 3 https //www facebook com/hooksbookswanderlust 4 https //www youtube com/hooksbookswanderlust
